name: Dark Paradise
description:
It’s a cold night in the city of Paradise and your daughter has been taken. The people who have her are criminals, they are making you do their dirty work to ensure her safety.

From planting evidence at a scene of a crime to stealing artwork from a gallery, these thugs are running things from behind the scenes.

Your only option is to continue into the night and do the bidding of these criminals  who have taken her from you. The only question which remains is will you have the skills to bring your little girl home?

Key board controls

< >Arrow keys

'Return' to continue when on text based screens.

Game features

  • Can be played on desktop, tablet and mobile.
  • A story driven thriller with hand painted style visuals.
  • Huge open world to explore.
  • 4 chapters. (about 45 minutes of total game time)
  • Different styles of gameplay including: stealth, top down movement and platform.
  • A dark and sinister soundtrack to add to the mood of the story.
  • A twisty plot which keeps you guessing right until the end.

This game is family friendly with no violence.

Made for the Made for the game jam: Metroidvania Month 15.
